pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Friday, September 11, 2020 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Gogama, Ontario

10:30 a.m.  The Prime Minister will participate in the Côté Gold Project groundbreaking ceremony with the Premier of Ontario, Doug Ford.

Watershed 144
Sultan Industrial Road

12:30 p.m. The Prime Minister and the Premier of Ontario Doug Ford will take questions from the media.

Watershed 144
Sultan Industrial Road

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 9:30 a.m.
  • Media are asked to follow event signs off Highway 144 leading to the event entrance.
